publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4112 Jamie McGrigor: Congratulations to Mr William S McArthur Jr on Honorary Award from the University of Strathclydeâ€”That the Parliament notes the award conferred by the University of Strathclyde on US citizen Mr William S McArthur on 6 May 2009 of a Doctor of Science honoris causa; notes that Mr McArthur has close connections with Scotland, including family roots in Argyll; congratulates Mr McArthur on this award in recognition of his distinguished career in NASA, which included taking part in three space shuttle missions and one expedition to the International Space Station via the Russian Soyuz spacecraft; further notes that his latest honour comes on top of previous awards including the NASA Space Flight Medal and the NASA Distinguished Service Medal, and believes that Mr McArthur has made an extremely important and lasting contribution to space travel and acted as an inspiration to a generation of young people worldwide. Supported by: Bill Aitken*, Rob Gibson*, Jackson Carlaw*, Mary Scanlon*, Nanette Milne*, Murdo Fraser*, Elizabeth Smith*, John Lamont*, Ted Brocklebank*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-4112 Congratulations to Mr William S McArthur Jr on Honorary Award from the University of Strathclyde (lodged on 12 May 2009) Bill Kidd*, Liam McArthur*, Robin Harper*
